p: In total, 80,977 participants were included in the 76 studies. The prevalence of DENV infection varied widely depending on clinical presentation and biomarkers of infection considered (Table 1). The IgG seroprevalence in febrile participants was 24.8% (95%CI 13.8–37.8) and 15.6% (95%CI 9.9–22.2) in apparently healthy individuals without significant difference ( p = 0.165) (Fig. 2; Table 1). Sensitivity analysis considering only study with DENV infection confirmation by PNRT test yielded findings in the range of that of crude analysis (Table 1).
